resources.string: What is the musical precursor genre of Heavy Metal, that the list of great hits counts on Stairway to Heaven, Born to be Wild and Smoke in the Water?
What is the 70\'s band that is recognized by most as the creator of Heavy Metal?
What is the subgenre of Heavy Metal characterized by being influenced by jazz fusion and classical music as well as having conceptual albums and delving into a complex music technique and theory?
